            Mikhael Manurung
          
          
            
              Welcome to my site! I am a post-doctoral fellow at Leiden University Center for Infectious Diseases (LU-CID) at the Leiden University Medical Center, where I use CyTOF, RNA-Seq, and scRNA-Seq to improve our understanding of immune response upon parasitic infection and vaccination.
            
            
              Welcome to my site! I am a post-doctoral fellow at Leiden University Center for Infectious Diseases (LU-CID) at the Leiden University Medical Center, where I use CyTOF, RNA-Seq, and scRNA-Seq to improve our understanding of immune response upon parasitic infection and vaccination.
